title: L'Hosp., Optimization, Power Series part - b

content.question: Let f be the function given by f(x) = cos(2x). Write the first four nonzero terms and the general term of the Taylor series for f about x = 0 .

frqParts.text: Let f be the function given by f(x) = cos(2x). Write the first four nonzero terms and the general term of the Taylor series for f about x = 0 .

topic.text: 10.15: (BC ONLY) Representing Functions as Power Series

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
